txt.en: 'Well now, you have done well on your hunt. I will give you that. Hides for the národ. Hides to keep my people warm. That is good!'

'You, kízinek, stranger. You wish to be useful? We are cold. Too cold for the mountain heights. No such cold where we have come from, and besides, travel has worn our clothing bare.\n\n'Nor are we swift at hunting like you, [placeholder]. Will you gather hides from deer to keep us warm?'
Hórin can be found in Skarháld.\n\nYou should return to Hórin with the hides.
Hórin, a Zhélruka Dwarf, says his people do not have clothing warm enough to go up into the mountains.
Deer can be found in Ered Mithrin.\n\nYou should collect hides from harts and hinds around Ered Mithrin.
